questions.prompt: What's the title of the job?
Did you know companies that allow for remote work are more likely to have diverse teams?
Are you open to remote work?
How many years of experience for this role?
How many employees does your company have?
Did you know companies in the top quartile of gender diversity are 15% more likely to outperform their peers financially?
What level of experience are you looking for?
Did you know companies that hire junior developers are able to promote them to senior developers in less than 2 years?
Are you open to providing on-the-job training?
Are you looking for a generalist or a specialist?
